projects.title: Responsive Portfolio Website
projects.description: A personal website built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It features responsive design, dark mode toggle, and interactive skill buttons.

projects.title: Task Manager App
projects.description: A to-do list web app with local storage, dynamic task filtering, and task prioritization using JavaScript.

projects.title: CSS Animation Gallery
projects.description: A showcase of creative CSS animations and transitions, including hover effects, loaders, and text animations.

projects.title: Media Player UI
projects.description: An HTML5-based custom media player interface featuring audio/video controls, progress bars, and responsive layout.

projects.title: Dark/Light Mode Template
projects.description: A starter template with built-in dark/light theme toggling, saving preferences using localStorage.
